generated_body: If you choose to read "This is what the trade war looks like in bourbon country," you may expect an examination of how the ongoing trade tensions, particularly with countries like China, have impacted the bourbon industry in Kentucky. Additionally, it may provide insights into the broader economic implications for the region, including the perspectives of industry professionals and workers.
